description: This file defines the interface for latency measurement RBUS handler APIs used in a TR-181 data model context. It includes macro definitions for TR-181 parameters, function declarations for initializing latency measurement, get/set handlers for boolean, uint, string properties, event handling functions, and external file dependencies.

methods.name: LatencyMeasurementRbusInit
methods.description: Initializes the RBus latency measurement component.

methods.name: TestDiagnostic_LatencyMeasure_GetBoolHandler
methods.description: Handler for getting boolean latency measurement parameters.

methods.name: TestDiagnostic_LatencyMeasure_SetBoolHandler
methods.description: Handler for setting boolean latency measurement parameters.

methods.name: TestDiagnostic_LatencyMeasure_GetUintHandler
methods.description: Handler for getting unsigned integer latency measurement parameters.

methods.name: TestDiagnostic_LatencyMeasure_SetUintHandler
methods.description: Handler for setting unsigned integer latency measurement parameters.

methods.name: TestDiagnostic_LatencyMeasure_GetStringHandler
methods.description: Handler for getting string latency measurement parameters.

methods.name: TestDiagnostic_LatencyMeasure_SetStringHandler
methods.description: Handler for setting string latency measurement parameters.

methods.name: TestDiagnostic_LatencyMeasure_EventStringHandler
methods.description: Handler for latency measurement event string subscriptions.

methods.name: LatencyMeasure_EventParamStringValue
methods.description: Function to get event parameter string value for latency measurement.
